LanguageData.Apparel_AuthorityCap.label: authority cap
LanguageData.Apparel_AuthorityCap.description: A hat with a stiff brim and peaked top. It's not particularly protective, but it creates a sense of authority and makes the wearer more effective in suppressing slaves.
LanguageData.Apparel_Broadwrap.label: broadwrap
LanguageData.Apparel_Broadwrap.description: Wrapped fabric sheets that loosely cover the wearer's head and shoulders.
LanguageData.Apparel_Collar.label: slave collar
LanguageData.Apparel_Collar.description: An uncomfortable collar made for slaves. It reminds the wearer of their slave status and psychologically suppresses them, reducing the chance of a slave rebellion.
LanguageData.Apparel_Flophat.label: flophat
LanguageData.Apparel_Flophat.description: A large, thick cap, similar to a tuque. It has extra fabric along the back.
LanguageData.Apparel_Headwrap.label: headwrap
LanguageData.Apparel_Headwrap.description: A wrapped piece of fabric which covers the wearer's hair.
LanguageData.Apparel_Shadecone.label: shadecone
LanguageData.Apparel_Shadecone.description: A conical woven hat. Good for keeping cool during long hours in the sun.
LanguageData.Apparel_Slicecap.label: slicecap
LanguageData.Apparel_Slicecap.description: A hard cap that partly covers the wearer's scalp.
LanguageData.Apparel_Tailcap.label: tailcap
LanguageData.Apparel_Tailcap.description: A thick cap made from animal skin with a stylish bushy tail. Great for keeping warm in winter.
LanguageData.Apparel_VisageMask.label: visage mask
LanguageData.Apparel_VisageMask.description: A hard facial mask that resembles a stylized face.
